entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 a.m. PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. A few showers over western sections this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill near minus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
